mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (CONTENT, STAR, MOVIE_ID, IS_CRITIC) VALUES (#{content}, #{rvStar}, #{mvId}, #{is_Critic})
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT, STAR as rvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, REVIEW_ID AS rvId FROM REVIEW JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = REVIEW.MOVIE_ID WHERE WRITER = #{writer}
SELECT CONTENT, STAR as rvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, REVIEW_ID as rvId, MOVIE.MOVIE_IMG AS mvImg FROM REVIEW JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = REVIEW.MOVIE_ID WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{rvId}

SELECT CONTENT, STAR AS rvStar, REVIEW_TITLE AS rvTitle, WRITER, REVIEW_ID AS rvId, REVIEW.MOVIE_ID AS mvId FROM REVIEW JOIN MOVIE ON MOVIE.MOVIE_ID = REVIEW.MOVIE_ID WHERE REVIEW.MOVIE_ID = #{mvId} and IS_CRITIC ='Y'
